dc_title_s: Second-level Administrative Divisions, Central African Republic, 2015
dc_description_s: This polygon shapefile contains the second-level administrative divisions of Central African Republic (adm2). Level 2 divisions include sub-prefectures. This layer is part of the Global Administrative Areas 2015 (v2.8) dataset. Hijmans, R. and University of California, Berkeley, Museum of Vertebrate Zoology. (2015). Second-level Administrative Divisions, Central African Republic, 2015. UC Berkeley, Museum of Vertebrate Zoology. Available at: http://purl.stanford.edu/zz702qb0684 This layer is presented in the WGS84 coordinate system for web display purposes. Downloadable data are provided in native coordinate system or projection.
dc_publisher_s: University of California, Berkeley. Museum of Vertebrate Zoology
dc_creator_sm: University of California, Berkeley. Museum of Vertebrate Zoology
